metadata.title: Advantage of using VBUSEN with a dedicated port

sections.content:
Question:
Is there an advantage in using VBUSEN with a dedicated port? (Is there a disadvantage in using a general-purpose port for output?) 
Answer:
Because a general-purpose port can substitute for VBUSEN, there is no disadvantage even when a general-purpose port is used. 
Suitable Products
RX
